Hi there 👋! I’m Eirini, a minimalist AI/ML Engineer inspired by fast.ai’s practical approach.
With AI’s vast landscape, I embrace Just-in-Time learning.

  • 🔭 Proponent of simple, modern toolchains, and lightweight toolstacks such as TypeScript with Deno or Go.
  • 💼 Advocate of 🌐 remote work in 🌱culture-first organisations.
  • 📖 Avidly tracking tech trends via curated sources

Always eager to learn and connect, thanks for visiting 🙏!
